channel.title: Once u go 3d
channel.description:
... you never want to go back.
ok i found this client mod that gives you more 3d mode choices.
NOTE: it is only for 1.3 right now and hasnt been updated(it is planned on an update with mod loader compatibility. i cant wait!!!). i have the 1.3 jar backed up and got it working so u would have to play around with it in single player but it is still amazing.
NOTE 2: version 3.0 of the mod doesnt work it crashes the client, i used 2.1(its pretty much the same this just one has a extra thing the other one does, and also that one doesnt work[3.0].) and it worked perfectly for 1.3_01.
here is the thread on minecraft forums: [url=http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=1032&t=169992&sid=c00883da6e0eff23008cdac60b12843f]http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=1032&t=169992&sid=c00883da6e0eff23008cdac60b12843f[/url]
i use the side by side mode. it is amazing. if u have colored 3d glasses u can use them if u dont want to cause ur eyes discomfort. but the side by side thing can be achieved without crossing ur eyes with either mirrors, dual monitor, hmd(head mounted display, [url=http://www.vuzix.com/home/]http://www.vuzix.com/home/[/url]), or a device that will separate them for you([url=http://www.3dstereo.com/viewmaster/lor-pix.html]http://www.3dstereo.com/viewmaster/lor-pix.html[/url], or [url=http://www.3dstereo.com/viewmaster/nv-pok.html]http://www.3dstereo.com/viewmaster/nv-pok.html[/url].
if you dont know how to use side by side here is a youtube video that might help you. [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBa-bCxsZDk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBa-bCxsZDk[/url] (gez it took me like 20 mins to find b/c i wasnt using the correct keyword...)
heres a video which is on that thread if u want to see the side by side: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4V8Umxm9XIo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4V8Umxm9XIo[/url]
im in class so if there is anymore info that i forgot to mention sorry.

item.title: Once u go 3d
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

Sun Chips:

i love using the 3d but i cant build with it high up as i get scared.

i know its adds fear to height on there. its like 2d, “thats not too scary”, 3d, “oh shit”. i made a jump like 64+ blocks down it was different. i had water at the bottom so i didnt take damage.

Read full topic

item.title: Once u go 3d
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I had 3d for black ops but I rarely use it. 3D gets strenuous on the eyes after a little bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Once u go 3d
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

try doing this after taking a huge﻿ shit

I just took a shit I am not doing this.

Read full topic

item.title: Once u go 3d
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

… you never want to go back.

ok i found this client mod that gives you more 3d mode choices.

NOTE: it is only for 1.3 right now and hasnt been updated(it is planned on an update with mod loader compatibility. i cant wait!!!). i have the 1.3 jar backed up and got it working so u would have to play around with it in single player but it is still amazing.

NOTE 2: version 3.0 of the mod doesnt work it crashes the client, i used 2.1(its pretty much the same this just one has a extra thing the other one does, and also that one doesnt work[3.0].) and it worked perfectly for 1.3_01.

here is the thread on minecraft forums: http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=1032&t=169992&sid=c00883da6e0eff23008cdac60b12843f

i use the side by side mode. it is amazing.
if u have colored 3d glasses u can use them if u dont want to cause ur eyes discomfort. but the side by side thing can be achieved without crossing ur eyes with either mirrors, dual monitor, hmd(head mounted display, http://www.vuzix.com/home/), or a device that will separate them for you(http://www.3dstereo.com/viewmaster/lor-pix.html, or http://www.3dstereo.com/viewmaster/nv-pok.html.

if you dont know how to use side by side here is a youtube video that might help you.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBa-bCxsZDk (gez it took me like 20 mins to find b/c i wasnt using the correct keyword…)

heres a video which is on that thread if u want to see the side by side: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4V8Umxm9XIo

im in class so if there is anymore info that i forgot to mention sorry.
